languages.text: "Мне казалось, я говорю с тобой, но слышу я слова Теодоры — жадные, самодовольные. Твоя выгода — порядок, который воцарится на этой станции, ее покорность Императору, Его закону и наместникам".

"I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."
languages.original_text: "Мне казалось, я говорю с тобой, но слышу я слова Теодоры — жадные, самодовольные. Твоя выгода — порядок, который воцарится на этой станции, ее покорность Императору, Его закону и наместникам".

languages.text: “我本以为你有你自己的思想，可现在，我却听到了西奥多拉那贪婪自大的腔调。这座星站会恢复秩序，会再次服从帝国的律法，为帝皇与祂忠诚的仆人效力，这就是你能得到的‘好处’。”
languages.original_text: "I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."

traits.locale_text: “我本以为你有你自己的思想，可现在，我却听到了西奥多拉那贪婪自大的腔调。这座星站会恢复秩序，会再次服从帝国的律法，为帝皇与祂忠诚的仆人效力，这就是你能得到的‘好处’。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前と喋っているはずなのに、何故かシオドーラの貪欲で傲慢な言葉が聞こえてくる。お前の『利益』とやらは、このステーションにもたらされる秩序、皇帝と主の法、そして主の召使への服従である」
languages.original_text: "I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."

traits.locale_text: 「お前と喋っているはずなのに、何故かシオドーラの貪欲で傲慢な言葉が聞こえてくる。お前の『利益』とやらは、このステーションにもたらされる秩序、皇帝と主の法、そして主の召使への服従である」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Creía estar hablando con usted y, sin embargo, oigo las palabras de Theodora, llenas de codicia y arrogancia. Lo que "gana" es el orden que reinará en esta estación y su obediencia al Emperador, Su ley y Sus administradores».
languages.original_text: "I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."

traits.locale_text: «Creía estar hablando con usted y, sin embargo, oigo las palabras de Theodora, llenas de codicia y arrogancia. Lo que "gana" es el orden que reinará en esta estación y su obediencia al Emperador, Su ley y Sus administradores».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich dachte, ich würde mit Euch sprechen, doch ich höre Theodoras Worte, gierig und voller Hybris. Was Ihr davon 'habt' ist die Ordnung, die auf dieser Station Einzug halten wird, und ihren Gehorsam dem Imperator, seinem Gesetz und seinen Vertretern gegenüber."
languages.original_text: "I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."

traits.locale_text: "Ich dachte, ich würde mit Euch sprechen, doch ich höre Theodoras Worte, gierig und voller Hybris. Was Ihr davon 'habt' ist die Ordnung, die auf dieser Station Einzug halten wird, und ihren Gehorsam dem Imperator, seinem Gesetz und seinen Vertretern gegenüber."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je pensais parler à {name} von Valancius, mais j'ai l'impression que c'est la voix cupide et orgueilleuse de Théodora qui me répond... Ce que vous y "gagnerez", c'est l'ordre qui règnera dans cette station lorsqu'elle se soumettra à l'Empereur, à Sa loi et à Ses intendants. »
languages.original_text: "I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."

traits.locale_text: « Je pensais parler à {name} von Valancius, mais j'ai l'impression que c'est la voix cupide et orgueilleuse de Théodora qui me répond... Ce que vous y "gagnerez", c'est l'ordre qui règnera dans cette station lorsqu'elle se soumettra à l'Empereur, à Sa loi et à Ses intendants. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Seninle konuştuğumu sanıyordum ama duyduklarım, Theodora'nın açgözlü ve kibirli sözcükleri. Senin 'çıkarın', bu istasyonda kurulacak olan düzen ve bu düzenin İmparator'a, O'nun kanununa ve O'nun idarecilerine olan itaati."
languages.original_text: "I thought I was speaking to you, and yet I hear Theodora's words, greedy and full of hubris. Your 'gain' is the order that will come to this station and its obedience to the Emperor, His law, and His stewards."

traits.locale_text: "Seninle konuştuğumu sanıyordum ama duyduklarım, Theodora'nın açgözlü ve kibirli sözcükleri. Senin 'çıkarın', bu istasyonda kurulacak olan düzen ve bu düzenin İmparator'a, O'nun kanununa ve O'nun idarecilerine olan itaati."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
